QuestData.Title: Hyphae Patrol: Gossamer Cliffs
QuestData.Description: Bad news from the Gossamer Cliffs. We need to help.$b$bThe varmints terrorizing the poor silk striders have become more cruel and aggressive lately. The silk striders are important to Ardenweald; more important than almost anyone else knows. We can't lose any more.$b$BLet me know when you're ready to go and we'll scare those gits away for good!
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride the fae rings and slay $2oa Blackthorn Assailants in the Gossamer Cliffs.
QuestData.RewardText: The little misses should be safe for now. Their purpose is vital to Ardenweald, and I won't have any more of them dying on my watch!
